Name: Cut the Vegetables
Description: Deal 2 damage. If this action was spiced, also deal that much damage to another enemy.

Name: Taste the Batter
Description:
Gain 2 vitality.
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, spice your next action three times.

Name: Serve the Guests
Description:
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, perform your draw ability.

Name: Prepare the Ingredients
Description:
Move all cards from your partner's field to your field.
Rotate any number of cards on your field.
Remove 2 time counters from each duration.

Name: Into the Oven
Description:
Deal 5 damage.
Spice your next action twice.
